Nanny Background Check Services

Nanny background checks can help parents hire a trustworthy caregiver for their children.

Here’s what you get with ShareAble® for Hires nanny background check services:

National Criminal Report

Run a criminal history check and receive accurate results from both state and national databases, including the National Sex Offender Public Registry and the FBI’s Most Wanted. Learn more about our Criminal Reports

Detailed Credit Report

Assess FCRA-regulated data in your prospective nanny’s credit report. Learn more about our Credit Reports

Identity Report

Make sure you know who you’re hiring with a nanny identity report, which provides name, address, social security number, and Date of birth verification. Learn more about our Identity Reports

Benefits of Conducting a
Nanny Background Screening

Broad coverage

ShareAble for Hires nanny background check services scan massive databases to provide more comprehensive results. Our nanny background check services scour over 370 million national and state criminal records and more than 230 million credit files.

More accurate results

When your child’s safety and well-being is on the line, you would want accurate data. ShareAble for Hires uses sophisticated record matching logic to match a criminal record to an offender. This means our babysitter background checks offer more accurate results and fewer false positive matches.

Immediate Access

You’ll be able to sign up fast online, and once that sign-up is completed, you get access to screening tools right away. This means that you could be able to hire a nanny sooner, and feel more confident after having conducted a reliable babysitter background check. ShareAble for Hires reports are processed and delivered within minutes.

Convenient online screening

The background check process is quick and easy, and you can complete your nanny screening entirely online. Screen anywhere, when you want and with who you want. You are in control.

Compliant data

ShareAble for Hires nanny background checks are FCRA compliant, providing regulated data that you can use to hire the right nanny for your family’s needs.

Easy payment options

There are no hidden fees. No sign up costs either. It’s free to start. And, ShareAble for Hires offers pay-as-you-go pricing, so you only pay for the nanny screenings you need.

How to Run a Background Check on a Nanny

With ShareAble for Hires, you can run an online nanny background check in three simple steps:

1

Send Request

Provide your nanny applicant’s email address. ShareAble for Hires emails a screening request to your applicant.

2

ID Verification

After your prospective nanny enters their personal information, we will authenticate their identity.

3

Receive results

Following identity verification, we’ll send background check reports directly to your inbox.

Nanny Screening: Frequently Asked Questions

When should I order a nanny background check?

A background check is an important facet of pre-employment screening for nannies. Once you’ve found a prospective nanny for your family, you can order a nanny background check to verify their identity and check their criminal record and credit history. Your nanny should be made aware that their offer of employment is contingent upon the results of their background screening.

What’s included in a nanny background check?

When you run a nanny background check with ShareAble for Hires, you can upgrade to our Background Check Pro package to receive identity verification, important criminal background information,, a detailed pre-employment credit report, current and previous addresses, and reported prior employment. Learn more about how to run a background check on your nanny applicants.

How long does a ShareAble for Hires background check take?

Unlike traditional background checks, ShareAble for Hires returns the results of your nanny screening within minutes. This gives you the ability to fast-track your nanny hiring process. Simply provide your nanny’s email address, and we’ll send over a request for authorization and identity verification. The moment your nanny provides authorization and verification of identity, we’ll process the background check and send you the results – within minutes.

What types of nanny screening can I do on my own?

In addition to ShareAble for Hires nanny background checks, parents can take a few additional screening measures to spot red flags. Some things that you could do include checking your nanny’s references, completing an education verification process, verifying their driving records, and conducting drug screening.
